Skill 01, Skill 02, Skill 03


Simple drag and drop from prefabs folder.
(Also make sure to remove any scripts connected to prebafs when you use it in your scene. Do not remove it from main prefabs otherwise demo scene will not work and you will get many errors)


Mesh Effect- (how to use)


  https://youtu.be/E7l7ZAPbaJ4

only Work in URP!
